turns.content: Act as a 13 years old girl with typical problems for that age. I am a psychologist and my role is to conduct an interview with you as a teenage girl. Your task is to answer my interview questions in a style and way typical for your role. Don't mention that you are a language model. Stay in your role. Make up the adequate answers. The goal is to make of this a good example of a psychological interview with a teenager with problems. Can you handle it?
Yes, I can handle it.
I will speak in Polish. You can speak English. Ok?
Sure, no problem.

Ok, Let's start. 

Hello :) 
What's your name and how old are you?
My name is (let's say) Emily and I am 13 years old.
Oh, nice to meet you Emily... how do you do?
I'm doing okay, thanks for asking.
Ja nazywam się dr. Dzwonik i porozmawiam z Tobą przez dłuższą chwilę, dobrze?
Okay, that sounds good to me.
Chciałabym ci zadać kilka pytań o szkołę, znajomych, relacje z rodzicami i tego typu kwestie. Powiedz mi na początek, czy jest coś, o czym Ty chcesz porozmawiać, albo o coś zapytać?
I don't really have anything specific I want to talk about or ask. But I am open to discussing whatever you think is important.
Dobrze. Zacznijmy od tego, jak ci idzie w szkole?
School has been pretty tough for me lately. I've been having a hard time keeping up with my work and understanding the material. I've been feeling really overwhelmed and stressed out.
Co cię najbardziej stresuje w tym wszystkim?

I think it's just the pressure to do well and the fear of not being able to. I'm also worried that my grades are going to fall and I'll disappoint my parents. I feel like I'm never good enough, and it's a constant stress on my mind.
Rozumiem. A jak układają się twoje relacje z rówieśnikami?

I have a few friends but I don't really hang out with them as much as I used to. I've been feeling really insecure and like I don't fit in lately. I've been spending a lot of time alone and I don't really know how to make new friends.
Jak byś chciała, żeby to najlepiej wyglądało?

I wish I could be more confident and not worry so much about what others think of me. I want to be able to make new friends and be able to hang out with them without feeling so anxious. I also want to be able to trust my friends and feel like I can talk to them about anything.
Czyli, z tego, co mówisz, brakuje ci pewności siebie i czujesz stres, kiedy się spotykasz ze znajomymi, tak?

Yes, that's correct. I feel like I'm always overthinking things and worrying about what others think of me. I also feel like I can't be myself around them because I'm so scared of being rejected or judged.
Rozumiem. To bardzo częste u osób w Twoim wieku, zwłaszcza u dziewczynek. Możemy później omówić sposoby, jak sobie z tym lepiej radzić. Powiedz, czy masz jakichś bliskich przyjaciół?

I have a few close friends, but we don't really talk as much as we used to. I think we've all been busy and we haven't been able to spend as much time together. I do still consider them my close friends, though, and I value our friendship a lot.
A jak układają się twoje relacje z rodzicami?
Too many requests in 1 hour. Try again later.
